pullrequest.title: First version of Displays widget with sample DisplayPlugins

content.raw: Humm I can't think of anything right now. It looks like changing the size policy to `scrollArea->setSizePolicy(QSizePolicy::Minimum, QSizePolicy::Expanding);` at least ensures that the collapsed texts are always displayed. I imagine one possible hacky way to do it would be to capture resize events from the scroll area contents and adjust its minimum width accordingly. We can revisit this later ;)
